mapper.update:
update activitysignup
activityid = #{activityid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
memberid = #{memberid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ispay = #{ispay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isneedinvoice = #{isneedinvoice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phonenum = #{phonenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invoicephonemun = #{invoicephonemun,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update activitysignup set activityid = #{activityid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, memberid = #{memberid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ispay = #{ispay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isneedinvoice = #{isneedinvoice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phonenum = #{phonenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoicephonemun = #{invoicephonemun,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * from activitysignup where activityid=#{activityid} and memberid=#{memberid}

SELECT asp.*,m.headimg,m.name memname,m.companyname,p.name positionname from activitysignup asp LEFT join member m on asp.memberid=m.id LEFT join position p on m.positionid=p.id where asp.activityid=#{activityid}
mapper.update: update activitysignup set tradeno=#{tradeno} where id=#{orderid}
